title: Galacard: Ackian Archives
overview: All three Galacard games in one package! Galacard: Ackian Archives is a collection of modern ports of games from the Galacard series using the original graphics and enhanced music. The games included are:Galacard (2024) - The basic Galacard experienceGalacard Platinum (2024) - Featuring an item shop and a new win systemGalacard Advance (2025) - Includes extra modes and different backgroundsThis series takes place in Planet Ack, which is inhabited by friendly people called Ackians. This small planet's favorite pastime is a traditional card game knows as Galacard, which they always like to teach to those who visit them.  Yes, that includes YOU!. All three games were remade almost from scratch with modern systems in mind, while still retaining most elements from the original releases. The general rules for Galacard are included in the menu.-- Controls  --KeyboardArrow Keys - Move CursorEnter - Start/Choose Game/PauseSpace - ConfirmAlt+Enter - Change Display Mode (Window/Fullscreen)ControllerD-Pad - Move CursorStart - Start/Choose Game/PauseA (Bottom Button) - Confirm
